duties_responsibilities.duty: Provide nursing care to patients in the medical-surgical unit, addressing their healthcare needs and promoting recovery.
Assess and monitor patients' conditions, administer medications, and assist with wound care as required.
Educate patients and their families about treatments, medications, and post-discharge care instructions.
Exercise critical thinking and decision-making skills to provide optimal patient care in a fast-paced environment.
Collaborate with the healthcare team to develop and implement patient care plans, ensuring comprehensive and effective treatment.
Maintain accurate patient records, charting, and documentation of nursing interventions and responses.

education_certification.credential: Active RN license in the state of practice
